description:
I thought Landon was workin' That 70's Show hair do, and well, most guys his age are sporting longer hair, so I was intrigued by his style.
I loved his natural good looks and his tight build, but mostly I love his face- he's got great bone structure.
Landon has one of those dicks that also just keeps growing the more and more he gets turned on. For a little guy, it sure gets big!
Enjoy!
title: Landon - Solo
